name: Little Circuit
description:
Little Circuit invites you to delve into the exciting world of electrical circuits and experience the thrill of creation in a user-friendly virtual environment. As a logic simulation sandbox game, it provides a platform for you to unleash your imagination and build a wide range of complex and sophisticated circuits with ease.




In Little Circuit, components serve as the building blocks for every circuit you create. With 22 unique and diverse components at your disposal in the current state of the game, the possibilities for circuit design are virtually endless. And with potential for more components to be added in future updates


List of current components
  • Relay
  • Or Gate
  • Not Gate
  • And Gate
  • Transistor
  • LED
  • Pixel
  • RGB Pixel
  • Touch Pixel
  • Switch
  • Button
  • Knob
  • Amplifier
  • Diode
  • Capacitor
  • Resistor
  • RNG (Random number generator)
  • Bit
  • Delay
  • Clock
  • Block
  • Label
  • Note box


The Custom Component Creator is a feature in a circuit building game that enables players to abstract complex circuit designs into a single component. This tool allows players to create custom components and incorporate them into their circuit designs.
